name: Good Night, Rowan
description:
Created in 48 hours for the Seattle Indies Game Jam 2018

🏆 Honorable Mention for Best Sound Design 🏆

Description:
Good Night, Rowan has been described as a "lullaby in game form." It is an escape room style game, where the player finds themselves in an unusual, quaint cabin. The player must explore the room's objects and look for clues in order to solve the puzzle. There's more to this room than meets the eye...

Controls:
Look: Mouse or trackpad
Interact: Left-click
Move: WASD or arrow keys

Credits:

  • Robert Ackley, Programming
  • Andrew Hermus, Programming
  • Andrew Hung, Programming
  • Sarah Belhumeur, Art
  • Steven Garcia, Music/SFX
